description: This file defines a custom Flutter widget called OceanAppBar, which extends StatelessWidget and implements PreferredSizeWidget to create a styled application bar with optional trailing actions, leading widget, and customized appearance.

classes.name: OceanAppBar
classes.description: A styled AppBar widget with customizable title, leading widget, and actions, designed for consistent theming in the application.

methods.name: preferredSize
methods.description: Returns the preferred size of the app bar, set to the toolbar height plus a small additional height.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the widget tree for the custom app bar, applying theme styles and layout.
